level.heading: Application to pending actions.
level.text: This chapter applies to requests for discovery in cases pending on [May 22, 2010].

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-147, see notes following ยง 13-441.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 8 of the Uniform Interstate Depositions and Discovery Act. See Vol. 13, Pt. II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
